mapper.select: select count(*) from member where u_email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into member(u_name, u_pwd, u_gender, u_birth, u_email, u_post, u_addr, u_phone ) values ( #{name}, fn_encrypt(#{pwd}), #{gender}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{post}, #{addresses}, #{phones} )
mapper.select: select u_name from member where u_email = #{email} and u_pwd = fn_encrypt(#{pwd})
